com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.animation

Interface AnimationStateListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnimationStateAdapter

    public interface AnimationStateListener
    Animation state listener.
    Author:
    Miguel Vicente Linares
    See Also:
    Animation

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAnimationFinished(Animation animation)
      This callback is called when the Animation finishes.
      void onAnimationFrameChanged(Animation animation)
      This callback is called when the current frame of the Animation changes.
      void onAnimationLoopFinished(Animation animation)
      This callback is called when the Animation loops.
      void onAnimationPaused(Animation animation)
      This callback is called when the Animation is paused.
      void onAnimationResumed(Animation animation)
      This callback is called when the Animation is resumed.
      void onAnimationStarted(Animation animation)
      This callback is called when the Animation starts.

    • Method Detail

      • onAnimationStarted

        void onAnimationStarted(Animation animation)
        This callback is called when the Animation starts.
        Parameters:
        animation - Animation that calls this method.

      • onAnimationPaused

        void onAnimationPaused(Animation animation)
        This callback is called when the Animation is paused.
        Parameters:
        animation - Animation that calls this method.

      • onAnimationResumed

        void onAnimationResumed(Animation animation)
        This callback is called when the Animation is resumed.
        Parameters:
        animation - Animation that calls this method.

      • onAnimationFrameChanged

        void onAnimationFrameChanged(Animation animation)
        This callback is called when the current frame of the Animation changes.
        Parameters:
        animation - Animation that calls this method.

      • onAnimationLoopFinished

        void onAnimationLoopFinished(Animation animation)
        This callback is called when the Animation loops.
        Parameters:
        animation - Animation that calls this method.

      • onAnimationFinished

        void onAnimationFinished(Animation animation)
        This callback is called when the Animation finishes.
        If the loop mode is enabled, the Animation never finishes.
        Parameters:
        animation - Animation that calls this method.
